# Load package

```{r setup}
library(compareid)
```


# Data

We're going to play with the package data, `table1` and `table2`.

```{r results = 'asis', echo = F}
knitr::kable(table1)
```

```{r results = 'asis', echo = F}
knitr::kable(table2)
```



# Data preparation

## select_id

We have to select the column that we want to work with:

```{r}
ids <- CompareID$new(table1, table2, "municipi")
ids
```

It returns a list with two tibbles, each with the selected column.
